name: Introduction to Neuroscience
description: This course provides an overview of neuroscience, including its history, basic terminology, and overview of current research topics.

name: Cellular and Molecular Neurobiology
description: This course covers the fundamentals of neuron structure, molecular biology, and physiology, as well as the development and plasticity of the nervous system.

name: Neural Systems
description: This course covers the anatomy and physiology of neural systems, including the brain and spinal cord.

name: Advanced Molecular Neuroscience
description: This course provides an in-depth exploration of molecular and cellular mechanisms underlying neural function and behavior.
